mapper.select: SELECT S.SPACE_NO, S.MEM_NO, S.SPACE_NAME, S.SPACE_SUM, S.SPACE_CATEGORY, S.SPACE_ADDR1, S.SPACE_ADDR2, S.SPACE_INTRO1, S.SPACE_INTRO2, S.SPACE_TAG, S.FAC_NO, S.SPACE_SITE, S.SPACE_IMG1, S.SPACE_IMG2, S.SPACE_IMG3, S.SPACE_IMG4, S.SPACE_IMG5, S.SPACE_IMG6, S.SPACE_IMG7, S.SPACE_PHONE, S.SPACE_CAU, S.SPACE_PEO_COUNT, S.SPACE_OPEN, S.SPACE_CLOSE, S.SPACE_BANK, S.SPACE_ACCOUNT, S.SPACE_DEPOSITOR, M.MAP_LATITUDE, M.MAP_LONGITUDE FROM SPACE S, MAP M WHERE S.SPACE_NO = #{space_no} AND S.SPACE_NO = M.SPACE_NO
SELECT SPACE_NO, SPACE_NAME, MEM_NO, SPACE_OPEN, SPACE_CLOSE FROM SPACE WHERE MEM_NO = #{mem_no} AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
